comments:
Build ID: I20070601-1539

Steps To Reproduce:
1. Open the workbench of All-in-one build
2. Check out some plug-ins' code of BIRT
3. Run the code as Eclipse Application with "-ea" or "-enableassertion" argument for VM arguments
